meanings.definition: A covering for the head, typically with a brim and a crown.
meanings.sent1: I wore my favorite hat to protect my head from the sun.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new hat for the wedding.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to wear a tiny hat, looking quite silly.
meanings.sent4: His hat of wisdom guided him through tough decisions.
meanings.sent5: The colorful hat stood out in the crowd, making her easy to spot.

meanings.definition: To put on or wear a hat.
meanings.sent1: He will hat up before going out in the cold.
meanings.sent2: They hat their heads before entering the church.
meanings.sent3: She decided to hat up even though it was warm outside, just for fun.
meanings.sent4: The team hatted up before the big game, ready for victory.
meanings.sent5: Hatting up in style, she felt confident and ready for the day ahead.
